description: I've used the Windows app before and it worked wonderfully. But, it doesn't work on Fedora. All I want do is install Fedora on a usb that will save my work so I can carry my work, everywhere. But, Fedoara does not make usbs with persistence. I guess I'll have to go back to Windows.
App fails to launch only in Ubuntu v18.04
summary: App fails to launch only in Ubuntu v18.04

description: He probado varias distribuciones y todas han funcionado, solo me queda una duda, en su sitio web dicen que es una aplicacion open source bajo GPL, pero en la aplicacion "Software Gnome" dice que tiene una licencia privativa ¿?¿?¿?¿?
